item.title: The UAE GDP forecasts have been released by the Dubai Chamber
item.description:
The United Arab Emirates’ (UAE) real GDP is predicted to grow by an average of 3.8% between 2019 and 2023. This growth will be driven by increased investment and private consumption, according to an analysis by the Dubai Chamber of Commerce and Industry. The Dubai Chamber UAE Macroeconomic Model forecasts a resurgence in private spending and sales of consumer goods, particularly in categories like vehicles, furniture, appliances, and medical devices. This growth will be supported by robust investment bolstered by government fiscal measures...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-uae-gdp-forecasts-have-been-released-by-the-dubai-chamber/
